11511.content:
{This takes place sometime after Buu, but before GT/Super.}

Bulma and Chichi often lamented their husbands' competitive nature. But the truth was, they were rather competitive themselves. Bulma's constant boasts about her looks, wealth, and intellect often irked Chichi and caused her to make bets to prove her OWN areas of superiority. The results of these bets often varied but one day, when Goku, Vegeta, and everyone else were off training, a very unique bet was made: "You what now?

Chichi smirked. "You heard me: I challenge you to a weight gain and gas contest. We'll see who can become the fattest in six month and settle it with a belching and farting contest."

"You want us to become total slobs?" Bulma asked, half-amused and half skeptical. Chichi nodded resolutely. "Hmmm...okay, I'm in. I can rock any look. Any rules?

"No inventions and no using the dragonballs. This has to be all us. May the best woman win!"

Bulma smirked. "I plan to." Both rivals shook hands and the bet was on.

1151111.content:
Date: Age 777, September 7

Time: 11:43 A.M.

Place: 58N 018, 439 East District  , near Mount Paozu.  

Sitting opposite to her boyfriend’s mom in the kitchen of the Son household was the svelte daughter of Mr. Satan, Videl  . Although used to watching vast swathes of food be demolished by a single individual, she was baring witness to a massacre of food unrivaled by any Saiyan or Majin Buu. The table, counters, chairs, and floor were being flooded in various utensils, pots, pans, cups, et al, all of which were literally licked clean. However, that was the closest thing to sanitation in the room, as every other square inch of surface area was being splattered in food, drink, and saliva. Not even the ceiling and windows were spared the carnage. One of them was covered in artificial protein and chlorophyll-based nourishment to such a degree that Videl’s vision of the outside was completely obscured. While the sight was repulsive, the smell and sounds were far more repugnant.

“So, you invited me here for what reason, again?” Videl questioned, wincing at the older woman’s sick behavior.

Chi-Chi   was either too engrossed in her meal to know what she asked or couldn’t hear her due to the noises made during the feasting. The Son matriarch was practically unhinging her jaw to accommodate the steak bones, brown banana peels, lumpy milk, and other inedible food being shoveled inside. There was so much food that she physically couldn’t chew with her mouth closed, not that she’d want to. This meant that her guest was subject to watching the food crammed between Chi-Chi’s chipmunk cheeks moisten with saliva. As she weakly grinded her jaws to further break down the food to the point where it could be safely swallowed, some of it was flung out of her mouth and landed damn near everywhere. Videl had to swerve and duck to avoid the regurgitated meal hitting her, though a few specks nailed her in the head and arms. Eventually, Chi-Chi managed to choke down a whole cooked turducken, drool leaking from her mouth as she did. She then felt particularly parched and began sucking on a 2 litre bottle of soda like a baby on milk formula. The bubbles tickled her tongue, making her giggle as it cascaded down her throat like a carbonated waterfall. After five minutes, the drained bottle was crumpled and carelessly discarded onto the littered floor. The chemical reaction between the sugary beverage and the partially digested solid matter caused the Ox-Princess’s swollen meatball of a belly to roar in agony, a sound that startled Videl but Chi-Chi had an easy way to remedy that.

“~*BBBBBUUUUUURRRRPPPPPPPP!*~ ~*PPPPPHHHHHHHRRRRRRRTTTTTT!*~”

Simultaneously, plumes of green and brown gas erupted from Chi-Chi’s north and south ends, respectively. Like an explosion, both fart and burp were short but loud, though the older woman still felt she could’ve done better.

“Ugh, that was so weak!” She yelled in disappointment.

The recently stunned Videl could think of just one response.

“What the hell just happened?!”

--------------------------------------------

“…And that’s why I invited you here.” The slovenly Chi-Chi explained, trying to lick some BBQ sauce off of her purple cloth.

Videl just sat in her seat, her eyes widened as she tried to process the new information.

“What happens after this competition is over?” She asked.

Chi-Chi gave a stare, unable to some up with a response. Yeah, she wanted to win, but even if she did, was it even possible to lose this weight after it had served its purpose? She was 220 lbs now for Kami’s sake! Twice what she was before this bet was made, and she didn’t know what her family would say about it when they returned. She was uncertain if winning was worth the potential embarrassment.

“I-I honestly don’t know. I’ve been so focused on beating Bulma that I never considered that.” The Ox-Princess answered.

“Well, my dad’s away on business and he won’t be back for a while, so I guess I could help…”

“Thank you! With you as a master, Bulma can’t win.” Chi-Chi declared, raising a pit-stained right arm in the air.

“Whoa, whoa. Just make sure no one else finds out. It’ll be humiliating if the wrong person knows.” The junior Satan requested with a blush.

“Deal.”
1151111.title: Getting Help From Your First Son’s Girlfriend.

11511122.content:
{Okay, the time-frame is the same.}

Bulma was no stranger to being competitive. In fact, some would say say she could surpass her husband Vegeta in this quality when given proper motivation. Such motivation came the day Chi-chi came over to show off what she called "the new her." The Capsule Corp heiress was shocked to find the Son matriarch had gained at least two hundred pounds since their last meeting and was dressed in stained, wrinkled clothes. Adding to Bulma's amazement was the way Goku's wife was outdoing him in the eating department, devouring the buffet lunch that Mrs. Brief had laid out for guests.

"Isn't it wonderful Bulma? Now that I've finally gotten to loosen up and forgotten about being a perfect wife, I feel great!" Chi-chi punctuated her sentence with a huge belch. Bulma waved the smell away and tried to smile. "Uh...that's great and all, Chichi, but what about Goku? Don't you think he'd be a bit... shocked to see you this way?

Chi-chi scoffed. "Oh, he never pays attention to me. Who cares, anyway? The slob life is the life for me!"

Bulma shrugged. "Suit yourself. I could never do it."

Chi-chi barked a laugh, spraying food from her mouth. "You? Of course not!"

This caught Bulma's attention and she frowned, raising an eyebrow. "Excuse me?" "You're too prissy for the slob lifestyle."

"Prissy!?" Bulma exclaimed "I could slob out just as easy as you, and probably do it even better!""

Chi-chi snickered. "Sure. Wanna bet?"

"Yeah! I bet I could slob up more than you within six months and if I can't, I'll support your lifestyle for the next ten years!"
"Hmmm...deal. But if you win, I want to have a belching and farting contest! It will be fun to have my first slob competition." Both women shook hands and the bet was on."

1211.content:
In the Son home located in the remote mountain region, the wife and mother of some of Earth’s greatest heroes was busy with the herculean task of making a meal for some of Earth’s greatest heroes.

The room temperature in the kitchen increased due to the steam coming from the multitude of pots and pans on stoves and in ovens. The humidity made Chi-Chi’s hair poof out a bit. Her sweat glands poured cooling, but smelly liquid all over her body because of the heat. This only made her job more difficult as she had to stay farther away from the food in order to avoid dropping sweat in it. Also not making anything easier for Chi-Chi was the fact that her eyes swelled up with tears from the delectable, yet surprisingly distracting fumes spewing from the delicacies that she was making. However, despite all of the obstacles she faced, the Son monarch gritted her teeth and somehow managed to complete the feast to end all feasts.

“*pant* Darn it. *huff* Usually, I don’t get this winded until the boys ask for seconds. *puff*” Chi-Chi said in between bouts of exhaustion.

The spread that was laid out on the dinner table had a size that was thought of as only possible in an All-You-Can-Eat Buffet with a special on all of the food. Its smell was almost incomprehensibly great. The only thing keeping it from being perfect was an unidentified raunchy odor in the room. Chi-Chi’s nose wrinkled at the stench, so she sniffed herself and nearly gagged with the realization that it was permeating from the dead-tired body of the Ox-Princess.

“Guess I better freshen up before the others get here.”

She then turned back to the glorious food that was literally laid out in front of her. Chi-Chi felt a odd pang of hunger in her flat and firm stomach. As she clutched it, a loud and low growl emitted from her belly.

“Or I could just start eating right now. I mean, I could just clean up after dinner.” She said.

After pondering for a bit, Chi-Chi decided to….

It was a relatively peaceful time in the world for the Z Fighters, eleven years have passed since Majin Buu's defeat (Kid Buu specifically) and the encounter with Bills. Since then there was virtually been no evil villains anywhere for the Z Fighters to tackle, but that wasn't stopped them from enjoying themselves with a couple of friendly sparring sessions and so on.

Fifteen year old Pan, the daughter of Son Gohan and Videl, was out soaring through the air far away from the city where she lived. Flying across various places, pushing herself to see whatever she could find in the far distance. You see Pan was out looking for something, recently she has been hearing all sorts of stories from her dad and grandfather, whenever he visited to see his family while training Uub. The two have told Pan about their experiences growing up and all the things that had to go through to tackle and accomplish their goals of getting stronger and protecting the Earth. Tales such as learning long traditional techniques like the Kamehameha, transforming into the various forms of the Super Sayian and the challenges they had to overcome.

Since that very day Pan has been really enthusiastic of going out and discovering a set of skills and techniques of her own; that she would like to show off to her friends and family. Continuing flying above some mountain tops Pan noticed a small yellow and green shrine near a waterfall. She lowered herself to the ground and landed in-front of the shrine. There she found the place to be completely deserted, as if no one has touched it in years. Cob-webs and dust was all over the place once she entered it.

"Hello...? Anyone home?" Pan shouted but the only response she got was a faint echo of her voice. While looking around to see what she could find, she came across a huge chest with a broken lock attached. "I wonder what's inside here..." she said. Carefully opening the lid of the chest, there she found inside were nine scrolls bundled together, a book with a blue hard cover and next to it were two jars filled with seeds with multiply colours and the other jar filled with some sort of black liquid.

"What's all this stuff," asking herself, she picked up the book and gently opened it making sure she didn't tear any of the pages.

"Masters Arts of the Slobocola Fu," she read. "Whoever finds this chest and the contents inside it, I hope my legacy will continue on from the grave. When I was still alive I wasn't sure if the world was ready see the potential of the Slobocola and I've shouldn't have waited too long, with no protégé to take under my hand; I died before showing it to the world. I hope you lone wanderer will somehow manage to continue my legacy and life-long dream. Signed Master Fartcii"

Closing the book, Pan couldn't help but smile. This was exactly she was looking for on her travel. She carried the chest outside in the daylight to carefully read the pages and scrolls before getting herself started.

"Okay then, where do I begin?" turning to the third page of book she read out loud, "In order to begin the art of Slobocola, you need to drink up the jar with the black liquid, later on you will be taught how to make more in the future. This liquid contains a special 'medicine' which increases your appetite and modifies the natural flow of your absorption of fat."

Not bothering to question the book's logic she picked up the jar, opened the lid and drank the liquid in one gulp. "Mmm... that was actually pretty goo-UURRPP!" instantly blushing from what escaped from her mouth. "Heh, don't know where that came from," she said to herself giggling.

The front door of the Son-Satan household creaked open to reveal its patriarch, Son Gohan. The adult demi-Saiyan strolled through the living room, humming a catchy jingle as he carried mountains of groceries meant for tomorrow’s dinner.

“Videl, Pan, I’m home.” He called out.

The reply to his greeting came in the form of a house-shaking belch that originated from the kitchen. Its odor wafted through air until Gohan’s nostrils were exposed to it. He hunched forward and clasped his nose shut to cut off the scent.

“Ugh! Wha wus that schmell?” He questioned though his closed sniffer.

Finding no other way to get an answer to his not-completely-rhetorical question, the first son of Son Gokū marched into the kitchen and saw an obscene scene taking place.

“~*BBBUURRRRPPPP!*~ That was great!” Stated the now 200 pound quarter-saiyan youth.

Gohan shielded his nose again, damning his alien-enhanced sense of smell for making the burp smell worse to him than to a full human, and turned to see his loving wife, who was in a fit of hysteria.

“H-How is this…? Where could? I don’t understand?!” She stammered, her hands pulling down her hair.

“Videl, what happened?” Gohan asked, resting the groceries on a counter.

The daughter of Hercule was still stuck in a trance before the words of her husband finally snapped her out of it.

“G-Gohan? I don’t know! Pan was the same as always when she left earlier today, but when she came back, she was like this.” Videl spouted.

Pan, for her part, was completely ignorant of her parents’ concerned conversation. Instead, she was contently drilling her right pinkie into her ear and popping any left scraps of food in her mouth, all while sporting a grin that showed her new laid-back personality. Then, she felt a large rumble in her lower stomach that migrated to her watermelon-sized ass, making her smile wider.

~*FFFFFFRRRRRRRRRRTTTTTTT!*~

Pan’s fart blasted from her butt with an odor far surpassing any currently emanating from her. The bent wooden chair that was already struggling to house her corpulent form at last shattered. The teenager landed on the ground with a thud, giggling at the ripples that the impact sent across her blubbery body. The fart’s blare caught the attention of the mother and father, and they gasped at what’d happened.

“PAN! Are you alright?” Gohan inquired.

The girl merely giggled in response.

“I’m fine, daddy. I’ve just did some really cool training today.”

“Training?”

“She said she found a training guide while she was out today.” Videl explained.

“Yeah! It’s in my room if you want to look at it.” Pan stated, still oblivious to her parents clear discomfort.

--

Gohan and Videl entered their daughter’s room and noticed the chest filled with torn scrolls, seed-filled jars, and a blue book.

“Hmm.” Videl said, flipping though the book. “Well, I guess Pan was telling the truth.”

“Yeah, but why woul-Hurgh!” Gohan groaned, having encountered another foul air that made his eyes water.

“What is it, Goh-aaaaugh!” His wife followed suit.

Both adult’s looked around the room until Videl caught sight of the small shit-filled pot and a pile of Pan’s clothes sitting next to it.

“That explains why she’s naked.” The woman mused with her left thumb and index finger pinching her nostril.

“We’ve got to talk to her about this.” Gohan said, to which Videl nodded.

“But first, we’re bathing her.” She replied.

--

After taking the plant pot outside and giving Pan about 3 thorough baths, the family of three sat in the living room, where Pan had exposited her exploits from earlier today.

“...And that how I got like this.” She finished, now sporting a larger version of her clothes courtesy of Gohan.

“Why would you do this, though?” He questioned, adjusting his ebony-rimmed square glasses.

“After hearing about all the cool stuff that you and grandpa Gokū did, I wanted to discover something for myself. I thought that if I’d learned some special technique or fighting style, then I’d be a hero like all of you.”

This made Videl and Gohan smile. It was nice that even at her age, Pan still looked up to them.

“Pan, we’re glad that you want to do something great to make us proud, but are you sure that being a slob is the way to go?” Videl asked, putting a hand on her daughter’s right shoulder.

The young hybrid contemplated her decision… for approximately 10 seconds.

“Yeah! I’ve already come this far, so I might as well finish it.” She declared with a confident smirk.

Gohan and Videl shared a look for a moment before turning back to Pan.

“I’m still not sure…” Videl mused.

“But I’m getting good at it.” Pan whined. “And I can it to help in a fight, too.”

“Really?” Gohan asked.

“Yeah. I told that I burped and farted ki blasts and made force fields with my BO. That’s useful.”

Gohan sat quietly for a few seconds. He felt her daughter’s ki and noticed that it had increased significantly over today.

“Alright, here’s what we’re going to do. You’re going to show us what exactly you can do with your new training. If you’re right about your new abilities being useful, then I’ll support your new lifestyle.” He offered. “Within reason, of course.”

“But if not, then you put this behind you. Do we have a deal?” Videl questioned.

“Yeah.” Pan accepted, then yawned. “But can we do it tomorrow? I’m tired.”

While she was told to wear her clothes again last night, after that discussion with her folks; she felt a lot more comfortable sleeping in the nude.

But not wanting to displease her parents, Pan decided to just put on her shirt that barely covered her breasts; while her belly apron hid her private bits in-front. As she admired her growing body in the mirror, her stomach suddenly gurgled loudly; literally making her belly vibrate and rumble a little.

"Man, I'm so hungry right now..." Scooping up her belly before dropping it down, making it slap against her thick legs. "But I need to check on my plant, Daddy took it outside."

She didn't quite understand why he took it outside, but nevertheless she was excited to it's progress. Not bothering to walk (Or waddle for her case) Pan instead decided to gently levitate above from the ground and fly out of her room, down the stairs and head straight to the garden.

Once she arrived at the garden, she looked around to find pot but she sadly couldn't find it anywhere. "Awwww... Don't tell me Daddy threw away instead?" She said to herself, getting a little depressed from the mere thought of that.

However that idea was put to rest when she discovered a plant she had never seen more. "Oh -UURP- wooowww!" She burped between her gasp.

There sitting between some bushes was this weird curly looking tree that looked as tall as her father. The bark was coloured with many stripes of brown and black, orange and yellow leaves that grew out from it's branches that had a weird autumn feel to them and looking down to it's roots, there she found the pot she used was broken into pieces as the tree's roots dug their way into the ground.

"Awesome!" She applauded at her 'farm' work, making her bounce a little from sudden enthusiasm.

Then she noticed underneath some of the branches, the tree was already baring some fruit. Light orange colour weirdly shaped fruits that almost resembled a pear.

Drooling uncontrollably as her lips quivered at the sight of the fruit, still feeling hungry from earlier, the fruit did look rather appetising...

Pan flew up slowly to the tree and collected a couple to try out. "These look very nice," She said.

Sitting on the grass floor with her bare ass, Pan sloppily licked her lips before taking a bite out of the first fruit. With a loud crunch, the fruit tasted very sweet and sour at the same time, making Pan shut her eyes very tight and moan a little from delight. Then all of a sudden, Pan felt a overwhelming boost of power filling up inside her!

Her body started to bloat and expand like before when she ate those Ki based meals, growing another chin on her face while her breasts and ass grew a lot bigger than before; along with her belly that was now starting to reach the ground where she sat. Her red shirt was slowly becoming a bra for the massively obese girl, ripping a little in the center. Eventually it came to a stop and Pan was huge in comparison to weight she was before!

UUUURRRRRPPPPP!!!

Belching loudly and devouring the rest of the fruit she bit into, Pan gazed upon her body and smiled joyfully with the changes. "This is perfect! Maybe Mommy should try one!"

1413122111211122.content:
(A/N: Mr. Lac, maybe this is more to your liking.)

Pan had wanted to give some fruit to her mother, but then remembered the deal her parents had made with her.

“On second thought, I could just hand her one after my demonstration.” She decided. “Speaking of which, I bet I can do a lot more with all this extra fat.”

Wanting to get in some extra training before the show, Pan got up on her feet with astounding ease. Her strong Saiyan muscles, having been further magnified by the decadent fruit she’d consumed, were capable of working through several inches of flab to keep the young girl standing. Though despite her newfound power, she still had trouble breathing.

“*huff* *huff* What’s this feeling… *cough* in my lungs?” Pan pondered.

Pan pressed her right fist to her bouncy breasted chest, hoping to dislodge the squirming substance that clung to her insides. After several forceful thumps, the mass bulged up her throat and quickly filled her mouth. Pan grimaced at the flavor of mucus that assaulted her taste buds and evicted the slimeball with a quick spit. The six inch wide green blob of saliva and snot soared through the air, landing on a large boulder 30 feet away. The slab of stone began to dissolve as soon as the glob made contract with it. Vapor rose from the once solid parts of the rock until the entire chuck of earth was liquefied into a bubbling soup.

“Huh, guess I can spit acid loogies now.” Pan summarized. “Sweet.”

Once more questioning the new limits of her repulsive, yet interesting abilities, Pan’s attention circumvented back to her newly acquired adipose. She gave it a quick shake, giggling as the fat rippled around her body, and got an idea.

Starting with a right hook, quickly followed by a high kick and left chop, Pan planned on working up another sweat, though not on using it for the same purpose as before. After a few minutes of surprisingly swift movement, every gland on the Sayian hybrid’s skin oozed sweat, especially on her perfectly spherical stomach. Her shirt-bra was completely damp, and her constant movement was what finally ripped it apart. Now stark naked outside (and reeking even more), Pan initiated the next phase of her plan by flying high into the sky, until her corpulent form blotted out the sun like a solar eclipse. The sun’s rays refracted off of the drops of Pan’s belly sweat, like with rain drops after a storm to create a rainbow, but Pan had something different in mind.

Putting her hands close to the center of her stomach with her fingers spread toward her popped out navel, Pan uttered the newly christened moniker of her somewhat inspired technique.

“BELLY FLARE!”

--

Meanwhile, the adults in the family were still in their bedroom, resting from the ordeal with their daughter, among other things. Their bed was in the same ruined state as Pan’s, albeit for completely different reasons. The two were spread out across the mattress, both half covered in messy sheets. Videl’s hair, normally tied up in a hip-length braid with an orange hairband, was now undone in a wild unkempt heap. Gohan’s hair was relatively unchanged from the usually spiky short style, but if one were in their room a couple hours prior, they’d see his ebony locks lighten into a pulsing gold.

The window was closed, though with open blinds and a black curtain, which led to something that would give the two a rude awakening.

*FLASH!*

Even with closed eyelids, Gohan and Videl were still exposed to the brief, yet powerful burst of white light that shone through the window. Gohan roared in agony and collapsed off the bed, while Videl buried her face into her white pillow to get rid of the blinding feeling.

“What the hell was that?” She asked.

--

Outside, Pan watched the aftermath of her impromptu attack. The light that emanated from her was so intense that a circle of grass below her was charred by it. Pan gave out a nervous giggle, before being greeted by her aggravated parents.

“Pan! What happened out here?” Gohan inquired.

“Oh, Mom and Dad. Why is your hair ruffled?”

At this question, Gohan and Videl were momentarily flustered, Gohan blushing and his wife looking away from her daughter, but they quickly got back on topic.

“That’s not the issue. What caused that bright light?” Videl asked back.

“And why are you larger and naked again?” Gohan continued.

Now, it was Pan’s turn to fluster as she blushed and rubbed the back of her head with her right hand.

“Well, the seeds in the pot that Dad took out grew into a big tree. Wanna see?” She suggested.

Pan flew down to the tree and snatched a different fruit than from earlier, and went to Videl, who was back on the ground. However, Gohan was examining the newly planted tree, plugging his nose as the scent of the ‘soil’ that it was fertilized in still lingered. He plucked some fruit from the tree too, noticing that the one in his right hand was light orange and spiky, like a durian. In his left hand was what appeared to be an apple, but this was smaller, blood red and looked a bit over ripe. These fruit seemed familiar to him, and then he came upon a realization.

“Oh no.” He muttered.

Gohan turned to his family, seeing that Pan offered the spiky fruit to Videl, unaware of the consequences that it would have.

“Videl, stop!”

1413122111211122221.content:
{A/N: Here’s my Christmas present.}

Videl aped her daughter’s technique, cupping her hands together and channeling her Ki to form a large yellow sphere inside. Then, she gobbled up the ball, moaning in delight at the unexpected taste. Pan jumped up and down, excited that she was able to learn it so quickly. However, Gohan was still in a fit of shock, wondering how exactly his wife and daughter’s mentalities were warped so drastically by just fruit.

“It’s pretty obvious that something weird is going on here.”Gohan mused. “I should take these fruits to Korin. Maybe he’ll know what they are.”

Gohan turned to the tree a plucked a few of the fruits. Then, he pressed his left index and middle finger up to his forehead, sensing of Ki of the old cat master. Instantly, Gohan was transmitted to the top of Korin’s Tower above Upa’s village. The white-furred feline was initially startled by the sudden appearance of the half-human, but quickly got over it. Gohan explained everything that he knew about the slobby issue concerning his family; Pan’s swift weight gain, the tree’s growth spurt, and the strange fruit that had radically altered Pan and Videl’s personalities. After several minutes, Gohan’s story had ended and Korin cleared his throat to speak.

“I see. This is the work of my old enemy, Master Fartcii.” He said.

“What do you mean?” Gohan asked.

“She is the dangerous mystical martial arts master; a disgusting, repugnant one who was also condescending and deceptive. She and I have quarreled in the past, when she attempted to obtain the Ultra Divine Water and somehow corrupt it.”

“I didn’t think that the Water could be corrupted.” Gohan stated.

“Well, she tried.” Korin explained. “I outmatched her combat skills, but she cheated by using magic. Although I prevented her from attaining all of the Water, she was able to get a cup of it and fled.”

“However, I do have some information regarding the fruits that you’ve brought.” Korin continued. “You see, in addition to participating in magical combat, Fartcii was also a certified botanist with an impressive knowledge of agriculture. Using these skills, she was able to grow and harvest these monstrous vegetations that can greatly affect those who consume them.”

Korin pointed to each of the fruit currently cradled in Gohan’s arms.

“The one that look like a pear caused rapid weight throughout the entire body, but also bestows an incredible boost in power. The durian-looking one gives whoever eats it intense gas. Finally, the apple dulls intelligence and can even send the eater into an inebriated-like state.”

Gohan was mortified by this revelation, especially at the mention of that apple, as it brought up bitter memories of when he had to be rescued by Goku and Krillin from the little blue deicidal conqueror, Garlic Jr.

“All three of these fruit also possess the ability to alter one’s mind to be more complacent and child-like, willing to obey someone with little hesitation.” Korin added. “It’s an effective way to recruit followers.”

“So, how do I return my family back to the way that they were?” Gohan inquired.

Korin paused, rubbing his soft chin in contemplation.

“Hmm. Well, I might be able to concoct an antidote with the fruit that you have, but it’ll take some time.” He answered. “In the meanwhile, you should worry about keeping your kid and wife out of trouble, and destroy that tree while you’re at it. We don’t want anyone else possibly falling under the influence.”

“I will, and thank you, Korin.” The young scholar bowed with a smile.

“You’re welcome, Gohan.” The centuries-old martial artist replied in kind.

--

Gohan returned to his home, preparing his next move.

1423121111.content:
Fasha sighed while breaking wind, knowing there's no way out for now. She realized a cycle of her drinking a concoction, something embarrassing happening to her, Frieza laughing, then barking orders. Fasha finally decided to speak up.

"Lord Frieza," she began cautiously. "If it's not too much trouble, may you just tell me what two vials to drink? I know I must drink the pink one, but what should I drink after?"

Frieza pondered about Fasha's idea. It wasn't really a bad thought. Just tell her two and get it over with. While it wasn't in Frieza's nature to agree with any of the Saiyans due to how primitive he believed them to be, he had to admit that this would speed things up while still allowing him to get a good kick out of this monkey's misery.

"Very well," responded Frieza. "Take the pink and orange ones."

The female fighter knew she should be careful taking two though, not knowing the effects of taking both simultaneously. Fasha was still smart, and knew how things like this worked. She opted to take the pink one, wait a second, then take the orange one. She grabbed the pink vial and immediately drank from it while cutting the cheese. Fasha didn't notice any chances, but again, she was disappointed and embarrassed. The difference was how this time she was scratching her butt instinctively, making her blush and cover her face with her free hand. Meanwhile, she smelled horridly. Her breathe instantly became foul and smelled of rotten eggs and meat. She farted again and would begin to cringe at the eye-watering scent. It became clear that this chemical made the once-powerful soldier smelly and have horrid manners that she couldn't control.

Attempting to ignore more of Frieza's wicked laughter, Fasha took the orange formula with one hand and drank quickly, picking her bellybutton with her other hand. Putting the glass down, Fasha unleashed a smelly burp, the smell instantly reaching her nostrils and making her cover them.

"God, this shouldn't be... U-Uhhh..." Fasha was stunned in the middle of her sentence. She couldn't speak as her mind began emptying. Groaning from a giant headache, Fasha placed both hands on her cranium. She felt so dizzy to the point of heading for and leaning on the nearest wall. As she kept groaning, drool began making it's way out of the Saiyan's mouth. Obviously, she didn't notice that she was drooling due to her excruciating headache. However, Fasha's mind began deteriorating. Her thoughts started getting cloudy, some of her memories were being blocked, and so many of her skills including language and math began fading away. The worst part was, Fasha was aware of it. The Saiyan woman knew she was losing her IQ, and didn't know how to stop it. She felt like crying as she was no losing her body and mind. She felt weak and helpless during all this.

At least her headache and dizziness had vanished, but the damage had been done. Fasha was now a drooling idiot, and was now fully aware of it.

"Meanie make me dum-dum," cried Fasha, thinking she'd never see herself shed a tear in her life. Frieza was literally at the edge of his seat. The galactic emperor was also shedding tears, but out of joy and laughter. He couldn't contain himself at this Saiyan's humiliation. He was laughing so loud, he had to move away from the microphone. Feeling like he needed a moment, Frieza went to the mic to say one thing;

"I-I'll be stepping out for a moment to regain myself," chuckled Frieza. "Just give me a moment, and don't get any ideas, monkey!"

Giggling his way out of the Moderation room, Frieza didn't feel too worried about Fasha. Now that she was an idiot, there seemed like there was no way for her to realize that this was an opportunity to escape. Frieza felt free to take his breather with no consequence.

Was this really the case though? Very limited thoughts and ideas raised the the Saiyan slob's head. She picked her nose as she stood in the test room. However, one of the thoughts that went through her dimmed state was escaping. Fasha hated herself, and this form. The thing was, she was very stupid. How could she realize that she could no escape?

Was Frieza right? Could Fasha realize she could escape?

It was done. Kakarrot had been sent to Earth conquer it (read: avoid becoming another one of Freeza’s puppets.) and his mother, Gine, was taking a walk down a hall when suddenly-

WHAM!

Landing on the floor, the ironically pacifist Saiyan rubbed her butt as she got back on her feet.

“Hey! Watch where you’re going, bud-Burdock?” She said.

Getting a better look at the person her knock over, she could see that was her mate: the low-class Saiyan warrior, Burdock, sporting a crazed look on his face.

“What are you doing here, running into me?” Gine asked.

“I came here to get help from the other Saiyans. I got a vision that Freeza would destroy the planet and he sent his mook, Dodoria, to kill my squadron. The others think that I’ve lost it, so I’m going to take him on by myself.” He explained.

This was all stunning news to the meek meat package employee.

“Burdock, you can’t. Freeza’s too powerful.”

“Even if it seems impossible, I’ve to try something to defend us.” Burdock argued.

“Well I won’t be of much help. I’m not a fighter, remember.” Gine pointed out.

“Yeah, but you can still get off of the planet in case the plan fails.” Burdock stated.

“What plan? You’re probably just going to fly into space and try to blast Freeza.”

“It’s better than doing nothing! Find a space pod and go to another planet, now!” Burdock instructed.

Gine thought about it for a bit. Sure, it sounded crazy, but Freeza wasn’t exactly the nicest guy in the universe. That, and her lover sounded pretty serious about the situation. Eventually, she decided.

“Fine, I’ll go, but I hope you make it out of this alive.” Gine agreed.

“We’ll see.” Burdock said with determined smirk, though he was surprised when Gine pulled him in for kiss.

This wasn’t an ordinary good-bye kiss, it was passionate. Their tongues entered each others’ mouths and Gine’s right leg lifted up. Gine wanted them to remember this for the rest of their lives (Spoilers: which in Burdock’s case, wouldn’t last much longer). After a few seconds, she relented.

“That’s in case your ‘plan’ doesn’t work.”

Matching her playful gin with his own smirk, Burdock ran out to the outside.

“Move as fast as you can! We won’t have much time left!” Burdock shouted behind him.

Gine nodded and headed back to the place where Kakarrot had been sent to Earth. In a few minutes, she’d arrived and was in the midst of determining where to flying her pod to.

“Should I follow my son to Earth? If someone found out where he was, then I wouldn’t fare much better.” Gine questioned.

Having little time to dwell on the matter, she ultimately chose to go to…

It was a bumpy landing for Gine. Though she was sleeping the whole way through (After all, it was a long trip from Planet Vegeta to Earth), that didn’t stop the Attack Ball from causing a shit ton of damage to the place it landed in. Once it did land, Gine awoke and disembarked. She yawned and stretched like any other person would, except her ‘bed’ was a 1.5 meter (4.92126 foot)-wide space pod that moved at 2,627,980,686,828 meters per second (5,878,625,373,183.607422 miles per hour). The attractive alien floated out of the smoldering crater that was about 7 feet in diameter and 9 feet in depth and was surveying the environment around her. She could tell that she was in a building of some sort, judging from the gaping hole in the ceiling above her. On the bright side, it was daytime so it was easy to see what was around her. There were 6x6x6 foot wooden crates surrounding her that were filled with something. Gine easily popped open the top and saw stacks of frozen beef patties.

“Hmm… What are these things?” Gine thought.

She sniffed them cautiously.

“They smell like meat, but they’re cold and hard and flat.” She said.

She took a bite and chewed for a few seconds… then she squirmed in disgust and spat it out.

“Bleck! This tastes awful.” The pink-clad female muttered.

She decided to heat it up using her ki. Forming a small ball of yellow energy, Gine placed it under the patty and it heated it to normal standards in a couple of seconds. The once red disc of dead cow was now a brown, juicy, steaming piece of dead cow meat fit to serve to the average fast food customer. Biting into it again, Gine’s eyes widened as she had a different reaction this time.

“Wow! This is much better!”

Though she lacked the violent nature of her brethren, she damn well possessed their appetite, as she began gobbling down the strange delicacy. Gine ate quickly, but still kept it at a pace where she could savor the flavor. Its soft texture felt heavenly to her and the thick grease brought pleasure to her taste buds. I just a couple of minutes, the food was utterly gone, lost forever in Gine’s digestive tracts.

“Mmm, that was so good. ~*BBBRRRAAAPPP!*~” The oil-haired woman emitted a ghastly, 3-second burp.

Her cheeks darkened to a light shade of cardinal and she clapped her hand to her mouth.

“Excuse me.” The female Saiyan apologized in spite of the supposed absence of witnesses to her slight lapse in manners.

Then, she decided to look for a way out of this place, hoping to discover what city this building was in. Seeing a door, Gine stepped through and found herself in the front side of the building. She could a counter, some tables, chairs, and, booths, and a big screen with pictures and names of food. Finally putting two and two together, Gine realized that…

“I’m in a restaurant of some kind. It looks so much different from the ones on Vegeta, but it has some basic similarities.” Gine concluded.

Believing this place to be closed due to the lack of people inside, Gine sighed.

“At least I won’t run into the locals.”

She set off to find her son Kakarot, but does something catch her attention first?

Ten minutes later both women were full and Gine let out a big huge burp," excuse me but I had to do that" Gine said," o that's nothing you should here this" Chi Chi said before letting out a big fat fart," pregnancy farts, I have them all the time especially with this one" Chi Chi said. Then Chi Chi asked gine," do you wanna come with me and exercise with my friends tomorrow cuz you look like you could lose some weight"," Chi Chi, I think your right, I shouldn't be this fat anyways, ever since I arrived here all I've done is gain weight so sure I'd love to come spend time with my daughter in law" Gine said as she rubbed her belly
14533111112111.title: Meeting the family and losing some weight

info.brief_description: Turn the powerful and smart babes of DBZ, into smelly, lazy slobs.
info.description:
I've noticed how there's been no slob story of DB/DBZ/DBGT yet. So, I took it upon myself to make this. In here, make the girls of DBZ gain weight, get gassy, lazy, smelly, etc.

Anyway, here are the rules:
1. No killing off the main characters. Minor characters can die, and as for major characters, they can die, but must be brought back sooner or later.
2. I'm being generous, and allowing sexual content, but just don't be too descriptive with it. Same goes for swearing.
3. Vore is allowed, but not too much of that, either.
4. OCs are allowed, but make sure you either describe them thoroughly, or post an image on them.
5. Stories about female OCs becoming slobs must include some of the actual characters from the anime/manga.
6. I probably should have put this up a little earlier, but no males can become slobs. Males can appear, and encourage females to become slobs however.
7. Please, no farting to gain weight. Characters can fart, just not gain weight from doing so.
8. Try to refrain from GT character looks, unless the character only appears in GT.
9. In the beginning story, in parentheses, put in what saga the story is set in, unless it's obvious. I.e. if the story starts off with Pan and Giru. Giru obviously appeared in GT, so it's clear the story takes place in that saga.
10. Dragon Ball character looks are allowed. I'm also allowing in some TF, and GTS. Just remember, however, that slob is the main focus of the story.
11. Scat is allowed, as well as being hairy.
12. Have fun!

Other than that, anything goes. DB, DBZ, and DBGT belong to Akira Toriyama, Fuji TV, Funimation, and Toei Animation. I do not own DBZ.

Oh, and btw, if it's not too much trouble, please make sure that at least some of the female slobs become dumb? I seriously think that's one of the most underused and underrated slob traits out there. You don't have to, but I'd love if you would. Thank you, and please remember to add.

EDIT: Male-to-male couples is now allowed, as are female-to-female couples. Just keep the focus on the slobs, though. Also, remember only females can become slobs.
info.pretty_title: Dragon Ball Z Female Slob Story
